tool_description:
Seamlessly integrate WhatsApp messaging and file-sharing (images, videos, documents) capabilities into your applications. Whether you're building a communication platform, a customer service solution, or an interactive application, we make it easy to enhance user engagement by enabling the sending and retrieval of messages, as well as the seamless sharing of various file types.

**Retrieve Message History**
Access and retrieve message histories for both sent and received messages, providing v...
name: Whatsapp Messaging Hub
title: Whatsapp Messaging Hub

api_list.name: Get Token / QR code
api_list.description:
Gets a Token that will allow the use of all other endpoints.

- Once you call this endpoint, we'll drop you an email
- Once you click the link on the email, you'll be taken to a page which will activate your account
- After your account is active, the page will provide a QR code which needs to be scanned through your WhatsApp - it will also give you the direct URL to the QR code or its Base64 string
- After the QR code is scanned, the token will be shown. An email with the link to the token will be also sent to you
